data.title: Send Gifts to India on Pongal
data.meta_description: The article discusses about sending gifts to India on Pongal through the online gifting portal, GiftstoIndia24x7.com

Rakhi strengthens the bond between brothers & sisters. Sisters from around the world can send rakhi to India & brothers from around the world can send rakhi gifts for sisters. Order rakhi online & get it delivered timely.

No time to read? Hereâ€™s a quick summary

On the occasion of Pongal, send various gifts to your loved ones in India. There are a variety of gifts to choose from those are available on our website. You can surprise your loved ones with gifts like flowers, cakes, gift hampers, etc. Add up to the festivities with some special festive gift hampers or vouchers even if you rea away from them.

Gifts occupy a special position in our social life. With the exchange of gifts, we express emotion and love towards our friends and families on any special occasion. Gifts are the expression of inner goodness and sincerity. Gifts are tokens of love and goodwill. Gifts play an important part in making us love one another. Indian culture is closely related to exchanging gifts on any occasion or festival. We arrange a wide range of gifting ideas for different festivals such as Diwali, Dhanteras, Rakhi, Eid, Christmas, and so on. The online store also offers a plethora of gift articles for occasions such as Teachers' Day, Birthday, Children's Day, Anniversary, and many more.

Pongal is the harvest festival celebrated specially in South India. Pongal or Thai Pongal is also called Makara Sankaranthi, since it is celebrated on the first day of Thai when the Sun enters the Makara Rasi (Capricornus). This signals the end of winter and the onset of spring throughout the northern hemisphere. For the next six months, the days are longer and warmer. Pongal is a four-day affair. The first day, Bhogi, is celebrated on the last day of the month of Margazhi. On this day, people decorate their homes. New vessels are bought and old and unwanted things burnt. Scholars have often compared Bhogi to the Indra Vizha celebrated by the Chola kings at Kaveripattinam, also known as Poompuhar. The second day is Perum Pongal, the most important. It is also called Surya Pongal because people worship Surya, the Sun God and his consorts, Chaya and Samgnya. The third day is Mattu Pongal, celebrated to glorify cattle that help farmers in a myriad ways. On this day, the cows are bathed and decorated with vermilion and garlands and fed. The last day is Kaanum Pongal. It is that part of the festival when families used to gather on the riverbanks and have a sumptuous meal (kootanchoru). It is also time for some traditional dances such as kummi and kolattam.

Silver Gifts

In the section of silver gifts there are gifting articles such as Traditional Diyas, Astha Laxmi Kalash, Silver Tulsi Plant and so on. On this auspicious occasion of Pongal, you can send traditional silver gifts to your dear ones. These silver gifts are specially and delicately designed for spiritual occasion. Welcoming divine goddesses with this auspicious looking silver diyas and other gifts. Send this beautiful as well as divine gift items to India to your near and dear ones on any special festival or occasion. Pair it with your exclusive Gifts to India and make the moments memorable forever.

Gift Hampers

A gift Hamper is a special and unique type of gift idea. The hamper is always a special gift on any occasion. Consisting of multiple gift articles, hampers are apt gifts to be presented at any festival or occasion including Pongal. We offer you a combination of various gifts wrapped collectively in form of hampers. There are a variety of spiritual hampers like CDs, Holy Idols, Shagun Coins and Spiritual Hampers.

Flowers

Flowers are the best gift ideas on any special day. A big bouquet of flowers coupled with a gift article will truly make the occasion special. Browse through the different kinds of Flowers offered herein. Roses, Orchids, Carnations, and Gerberas arranged elegantly in a hand-tied bouquet will aptly reveal your innermost thoughts. There are exotic arrangements of flowers to choose from. Life-Size Arrangements of flowers, flower baskets, or a bouquet of assorted flowers will surely enthrall your loved one.

We are into the business of online gifting since over a decade. The online store enables global Indians to send gifts to their friends and relatives across India. You can browse through the site and select some enticing gift articles to surprise your dear ones on Pongal. Thus if you know when is Pongal, then you can send Pongal gifts to India and add joy to the festival.
